nodes.text: "Zygerrian Takedown" was a free online supplement published by Wizards of the Coast on July 24, 2003. The mini-adventure was written by Jason Fry for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.

The mini-adventure is set in the Rise of the Empire era and is designed for four player characters in the 8-10 level range. As with almost all adventures, the time period and character levels can be adjusted as needed.
